Meski Tak Direspon Walikota, KNPI Jaksel Tetap Gelar Konser Amal
02 Nov 2019, 17:43 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Meski Tak Direspon Walikota, KNPI Jaksel Tetap Gelar Konser Amal

KBRN, Jakarta : Dewan Pimpinan Daerah (DPD) Komite Nasional Pemuda Indonesia (KNPI) Jakarta Selatan (Jaksel) sukses menyelenggarakan konser amal. Acara ini bertujuan untuk menggalang dana yang akan disalurkan kepada para yatim piatu se-Jakarta Selatan. Dalam acara yang berlangsung di Lapangan Sepakbola (ex) Departemen Penerangan, Kecamatan Penerangan tersebut, KNPI Jakarta Selatan mendapat dukungan dari berbagai pihak. Diantaranya Asuransi Takaful, Yamaha motor dan lain-lain. Ketua KNPI Jakarta Selatan, Fitria Octarina menjelaskan, dalam kegiatan ini, KNPI Jakarta Selatan juga menyediakan tempat bagi usaha mikro kecil dan menengah (UMKM) yang ingin mempromosikan dan menjual produk unggulannya.Namun demikian, Fitria menyayangkan kegiatan ini tidak mendapatkan respon dari Pembina KNPI Jakarta Selatan yakni Walikota Administrasi Jakarta Selatan. "Pihak panitia sudah berusaha meminta waktu kepada Bapak Walikota (Jakarta Selatan) untuk memaparkan kegiatan dan meminta dukungan agar kegiatan dapat berjalan dengan lancar. Bahkan sampai satu hari jelang pelaksanaan Konser Amal tidak ada jawaban atau repon dari Walikota," sesalnya di Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/3/2019).Lebih lanjut Fitria mengaku sangat berharap agar Walikota lebih memahami eksistensi KNPI yang menjadi wadah berhimpun seluruh organisasi kemasyarakatan pemuda (OKP). Perlu diketahui, konser amal ini dilaksanakan dalam rangka peringatan Hari Sumpah Pemuda dan Hari Pahlawan yang sudah menjadi Program Kerja KNPI Jakarta Selatan. (Foto : Instagram fitria_octarina)

Even though the Mayor did not respond, KNPI South Jakarta continued to hold a Charity Concert
02 Nov 2019, 17:43 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Even though the Mayor did not respond, KNPI South Jakarta continued to hold a Charity Concert

KBRN, Jakarta: The Regional Leadership Council (DPD) of the Indonesian National Youth Committee (KNPI) of South Jakarta (South Jakarta) successfully held a charity concert. This event aims to raise funds to be distributed to orphans throughout South Jakarta. In the event that took place at the Football Field (ex) of the Ministry of Information, the Information District, KNPI South Jakarta received support from various parties. Among Takaful Insurance, Yamaha motorcycles and others. Head of KNPI South Jakarta, Fitria Octarina explained, in this activity, KNPI South Jakarta also provided a place for micro small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) who wanted to promote and sell their superior products. However, Fitria regretted that this activity did not get a response from the KNPI Jakarta Trustees South namely the Mayor of South Jakarta Administration. "The committee has tried to ask the Mayor (South Jakarta) to explain the activities and ask for support so that the activities can run smoothly. Even until one day before the Charity Concert there was no response or response from the Mayor," he regretted in Jakarta, Saturday ( 2/11/3/2019). Furthermore, Fitria admitted that she really hoped that the Mayor would better understand the existence of the KNPI which became a gathering place for all youth community organizations (OKP). Please note, this charity concert was held in commemoration of Youth Oath Day and Heroes' Day which has become the KNPI South Jakarta Work Program. (Photo: Instagram fitria_octarina)
